question: Is it true that Muhyiddeen Abdul-Qaadir Jilani (ra) has raised people from the dead by making duaa to Allah?
answer:
QUESTION
Is it true that Muhyiddeen Abdul-Qaadir Jilani (ra) has raised people from the dead by making duaa to Allah?
ANSWER


Share:
Allah Ta?ala has the ability to bring anyone back to life. He sometimes does so on the du?aa of a saint. Thus, it is possible that Allah Ta?ala brought certain people back to life on the du?aa of Shaykh Abdul-Qaadir.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
